summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否创建桌面快捷方式。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to create a desktop shortcut.

value.span: “True”或“False”。

span.span: "true" or "false".

value.span: 一个包含值的字符串，该值指示是否创建桌面快捷方式。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DeploymentUrl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置应用程序的更新位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the update location for the application.

value.span: 指示应用程序更新位置的字符串。

span.span: A string that indicates the update location for the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未指定此属性，将为应用程序定义没有更新位置。If this property is not specified, no update location will be defined for the application. 但是，如果指定应用程序更新，则必须指定的更新位置。However, if application updates are specified, the update location must be specified. 指定的值应为完全限定的 URL 或通用命名约定 (UNC) 路径。The specified value should be a fully qualified URL or Universal Naming Convention (UNC) path.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool DisallowUrlActivation { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否应阻止通过 URL 启动应用程序。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the application should be blocked from being started by means of a URL.

value.span: 如果阻止通过 URL 启动应用程序，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the application is blocked from being started by means of a URL otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此选项，则`true`，应用程序只能从用户的启动**启动**菜单。If this option is `true`, the application can only be started from the user's **Start** menu. 默认值为 `false`。The default is `false`. 如果忽略此选项是`false`。This option is ignored if is `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ErrorReportUrl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置错误报告的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL of the error report.

value.span: 一个包含错误报告 URL 的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains the URL of the error report.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Install { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示应用程序是已安装应用程序还是仅联机应用程序。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the application is an installed application or an online-only application.

value.span: 如果应用程序是一个已安装的应用程序，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the application is an installed application; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此属性设置为`true`，应用程序将安装在用户的上**启动**菜单中，并且可以通过使用移除**添加或删除程序**控制面板中。If this property is set to `true`, the application will be installed on the user's **Start** menu, and it can be removed by using **Add or Remove Programs** in Control Panel. 默认值为 `true`。The default is `true`. 如果此属性设置为`false`，应用程序旨在用于在网页上的联机使用，仅适用联机。If this property is set to `false`, the application is intended for online use from a Web page and is available online only. > [!NOTE] > 对于 WPF Web 浏览器应用程序，您必须设置属性`true`，并且还必须设置到`false`。For WPF Web Browser Applications, you must set the property to `true`, and you must also set to `false`. 如果不满足此条件，你将收到[MSBuild 错误 MSB3116](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bf04c587-d0e2-4d68-bbff-da9a985ea70e)。If this condition is not met, you will receive [MSBuild Error MSB3116](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bf04c587-d0e2-4d68-bbff-da9a985ea70e).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool MapFileExtensions { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否使用 .deploy 文件扩展名映射。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether .deploy file extension mapping is used.

value.span: 如果使用 .deploy 文件扩展名映射，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if .deploy file extension mapping is used; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此属性设置为`true`，每个程序文件发布使用.deploy 文件扩展名。If this property is set to `true`, every program file is published with a .deploy file extension. 此设置可用于 Web 服务器安全限制的一定要取消阻止，以启用 ClickOnce 应用程序部署的文件扩展名的数量。This setting is useful for Web server security to limit the number of file extensions that have to be unblocked to enable ClickOnce application deployment. 默认值为 `false`。The default is `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ MinimumRequiredVersion { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置所需的应用程序的最低版本号。

span.span: Gets or sets the minimum required version number for an application.

value.span: 一个字符串，表示所需的应用程序的最低版本号。

span.span: A string indicating the minimum required version number for an application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果用户的计算机上具有低于最小所需版本，此属性指定的应用程序的版本，则用户将没有跳过更新的选项。If the user's computer has a version of the application that is lower than the minimum required version specified by this property, the user will not have the option to skip the update. 默认值是没有所需的最低版本。The default is to have no minimum required version. 此输入适用时，才设置为`true`。This input applies only when is set to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Product { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置应用程序的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the application.

value.span: 指示应用程序的名称的字符串。

span.span: A string that indicates the name of the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此属性不指定任何值，根据生成的清单的标识进行推断名称。If no value is specified for this property, the name is inferred from the identity of the generated manifest. 此名称的快捷方式名称上使用**启动**菜单并且属于的中显示的名称**添加或删除程序**控制面板中。This name is used for the shortcut name on the **Start** menu and is part of the name that appears in **Add or Remove Programs** in Control Panel.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Publisher { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置应用程序的发布者。

span.span: Gets or sets the publisher of the application.

value.span: 表示应用程序的发布者的字符串。

span.span: A string that indicates the publisher of the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此属性不指定任何值，从已注册的用户或从生成的清单的标识将被推断名称。If no value is specified for this property, the name is inferred from the registered user or from the identity of the generated manifest. 为文件夹名称上使用此名称**启动**菜单中显示的名称的一部分且**添加或删除程序**控制面板中。This name is used for the folder name on the **Start** menu and is part of the name that appears in **Add or Remove Programs** in Control Panel.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ SuiteName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

span.span: Gets or sets the suite name that is defined in the manifest.

value.span: 一个包含套件名称的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains the suite name.

value.span: 指示支持 URL 的字符串。

span.span: A string that indicates the support URL.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的值应为完全限定的 URL 或通用命名约定 (UNC) 路径。The specified value should be a fully qualified URL or Universal Naming Convention (UNC) path.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool TrustUrlParameters { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示应用程序是否可以使用 URL 查询字符串参数。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether URL query-string parameters are available to the application.

value.span: 如果应用程序可以使用 URL 查询字符串参数，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if URL query-string parameters are available to the application; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此属性设置为`true`，URL 查询字符串参数，则应用程序。If this property is set to `true`, URL query-string parameters are available to the application. 默认值是`false`，指定参数不应用程序。The default is `false`, specifying that parameters will not be available to the application.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UpdateEnabled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置指示应用程序是否可更新的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the application is updatable.

value.span: 如果可以更新应用程序，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the application is updatable; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此属性设置为`true`，应用程序是可更新。If this property is set to `true`, the application is updatable. 默认值为 `false`。The default is `false`. 此输入适用时，才设置为`true`。This input applies only when is set to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int UpdateInterval { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置应用程序的更新间隔。

span.span: Gets or sets the update interval for the application.

value.span: 一个整数，指示应用程序的更新间隔。

span.span: An integer that indicates the update interval for the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值为零。The default is zero. 此输入仅适用时，才和都设置为`true`。This input only applies only when and are both set to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Build::Tasks::Deployment::ManifestUtilities::UpdateMode UpdateMode { Microsoft::Build::Tasks::Deployment::ManifestUtilities::UpdateMode get(); void set(Microsoft::Build::Tasks::Deployment::ManifestUtilities::UpdateMode value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个对象，该对象表示是在应用程序启动之前在前台检查更新，还是在应用程序运行时在后台检查更新。

span.span: Gets or sets an object indicating whether updates should be checked in the foreground before the application is started, or in the background while the application is running.

value.span: 一个 对象，指示应在应用程序启动之前检查更新还是应在应用程序运行的同时检查更新。

span.span: An object that indicates whether updates should be checked before the application is started, or while the application is running.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此属性设置为`Foreground`，在前台检查更新。If this property is set to `Foreground`, updates are checked in the foreground. 默认值为 `Background`。The default is `Background`. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . 此输入仅适用时，才和都设置为`true`。This input only applies only when and are both set to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Build::Tasks::Deployment::ManifestUtilities::UpdateUnit UpdateUnit { Microsoft::Build::Tasks::Deployment::ManifestUtilities::UpdateUnit get(); void set(Microsoft::Build::Tasks::Deployment::ManifestUtilities::UpdateUnit value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置用于 属性的单位。

span.span: Gets or sets the units used for the property.

value.span: 一个 对象，表示用于 属性的单位。

span.span: An object that indicates the units used for the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下值是可供使用的更新间隔的单位： `Days`， `Hours`，和`Weeks`。The following values are available for the units used for the update interval: `Days`, `Hours`, and `Weeks`. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . 此输入仅适用时，才和都设置为`true`。This input only applies only when and are both set to `true`.
